title: The problem from transferring account region
body: I've shown my ticket i can't log in my account anymore both EU and NA.

replies.body: I've got your account pulled up now and it looks like something fishy might be going on. From what I can tell, someone might have hacked their way into your account in which case I'd suggest hitting up our account team asap! Your can reach out to them using this [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and rest easy knowing they'll be able to reverse any purchases they made for you!
No i just transfered my account from EU WEST region to the NA Region then i purchased RP 100$  then i can not log in my account anymore ..whatever in website or launcher
